item.name: XR5 RPC commit
XR5 Commit Setup
install XR5 cli R1
install XR5 cli R2
delete interface loopback R1
delete interface loopback R2
sync from network
replace config with operational

exec: pm.test("Number of nodes in output should be 2", function() {
pm.test("Status of all output nodes should be 'complete'", function() {

item.name: show interface loopback R1
show interface loopback R2
XR5 Commit Teardown
uninstall XR5 cli R1
uninstall XR5 cli R2
Tests
RPC commit all-routers
configure loopback on R1 all routers
configure loopback on R2 all routers
commit all routers
